casebody.data:
IN RE Application for Permit to Carry a Handgun of Calvin CARLSTROM (Calvin Carlstrom - Petitioner) C-549 September Term 2018
081981 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 21, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003244-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the appellant may serve and file a supplemental brief on or before May 20, 2019, and respondent may serve and file a supplemental brief forty-five (45) days after the filing of appellant's supplemental submission, or, if appellant declines to file such a submission, on or before July 5, 2019.
